name: Table
description: Table component for displaying tabular data. Provides a data-driven API with custom column rendering, sticky headers, and striped rows.

props.name: columns
props.description: Columns with id, label, align, headerCheckbox, render, sortable, sortValue, width, minWidth, maxWidth

props.name: stickyHeader
props.description: If true, header stays visible on scroll

props.name: sortBy
props.description: Column id currently sorted (controlled when onSort is provided)

props.name: sortDirection
props.description: Sort direction (controlled when onSort is provided)

props.name: onSort
props.description: Called when user requests sort; when provided, sorting is controlled

props.name: resizableColumns
props.description: When true, columns can be resized by dragging the header edge
